movieNight.descriptionThisWeek: The next movie night is planned this $weekDay.
movieNight.descriptionDefault: The next movie night is in $dayAmount days.
movieNight.movieUndetermined: Unfortunately the movie ist not determined jet. You can still vote a movie. If the movie is still undetermined one night before the movie night it will be randomly decided.

movieNightFinalDecision.titleDefault: Final Movie Decision for the movie night
movieNightFinalDecision.descriptionDetermined: The movie is now determined and is: $movie
movieNightFinalDecision.descriptionUndetermined: The movie was still not determined and was randomly decided. It is ...

movieNightStart.descriptionDefault: The movie night is starting. Get ready and join the $cinemaChannel channel
